verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: Wow] — [V: are] [ARG1: we] [ARGM-TMP: ever] [ARG2: in an A - plus pickle] [ARGM-ADV: as a nation] . Donald Trump has now lost all the aides who were apparently capable of tempering his ideas and even steering him in the opposite direction on merciful occasions . That means we should all get a lot more ...

Wow — are we ever in an A - plus pickle as a nation . Donald Trump [V: has] now lost all the aides who were apparently capable of tempering his ideas and even steering him in the opposite direction on merciful occasions . That means we should all get a lot more ...
